original_text: He withdraweth not his eyes from the righteous: but with kings are they on the throne; yea, he doth establish them for ever, and they are exalted.
korean_text: 그의 눈을 의인에게서 떼지 아니하시고 그를 왕들과 함께 왕좌에 앉히사 영원토록 존귀하게 하시며

sentences.original_text: He withdraweth not his eyes from the righteous
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 의인에게서 그 눈을 거두지 않으시며

sentences.original_text: but with kings are they on the throne
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 왕들과 함께 그들은 옥좌에 있으며

sentences.original_text: yea, he doth establish them for ever
